detail:
Decomposition failed: Failed to parse or normalize plan JSON: Could not normalize steps from decomposer output (no recognized step patterns).
Raw snippet:
```json

  "plan": {
    "description": "Extract data related to Google Cloud project shutdown and deletion warning from the email content.",
    "steps": [

        "step_id": 1,
        "task": "Extract project name",

        "output_variable": "project_name"

        "description": "Extract the date and time when the project was shut down.",

        "regex": "shut down on (.*?) UTC",
        "output_variable": "shutdown_datetime"
      },
